foreignData.name: Rhonas' Getreue
foreignData.text: Du kannst Rhonas' Getreue erschöpfen, sowie sie angreift. Wenn du dies tust, erhält sie +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges und kann in diesem Zug von Kreaturen mit Stärke 2 oder weniger nicht geblockt werden. (Eine erschöpfte Kreatur enttappt nicht während deines nächsten Enttappsegments.)

foreignData.name: Fornida de Rhonas
foreignData.text: Puedes espolear a la Fornida de Rhonas en cuanto ataque. Cuando lo hagas, obtiene +1/+1 hasta el final del turno y no puede ser bloqueada por criaturas con fuerza de 2 o menos este turno. (Una criatura espoleada no se enderezará durante tu próximo paso de enderezar.)

foreignData.name: Vaillante de Rhonas
foreignData.text: Vous pouvez surmener la Vaillante de Rhonas au moment où elle attaque. Quand vous faites ainsi, elle gagne +1/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour et ne peut pas être bloquée par des créatures de force inférieure ou égale à 2 ce tour-ci. (Une créature surmenée ne se dégage pas pendant votre prochaine étape de dégagement.)

foreignData.name: Temeraria di Rhonas
foreignData.text: Puoi stremare la Temeraria di Rhonas mentre attacca. Quando lo fai, prende +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno e non può essere bloccata da creature con forza pari o inferiore a 2 in questo turno. (Una creatura stremata non STAPpa durante il tuo prossimo STAP.)

foreignData.name: ロナスの重鎮
foreignData.text: ロナスの重鎮が攻撃するに際し、あなたはこれを督励してもよい。そうしたとき、ターン終了時まで、これは＋１/＋１の修整を受けるとともに、このターン、これはパワーが２以下のクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。（督励されたクリーチャーは、あなたの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士

foreignData.name: 로나스의 숙련병
foreignData.text: 당신은 로나스의 숙련병으로 공격을 선언하면서 로나스의 숙련병을 분전시킬 수 있다. 그렇게 할 때, 로나스의 숙련병은 턴종료까지 +1/+1을 받고 이 턴에 공격력이 2 이하인 생물에게 방어될 수 없다. (분전한 생물은 당신의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.)

foreignData.name: Destemida de Rhonas
foreignData.text: Você pode exaurir Destemida de Rhonas conforme ela ataca. Quando você faz isso, ela recebe +1/+1 até o final do turno e não pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com poder igual ou inferior a 2 neste turno. (Uma criatura exaurida não será desvirada durante sua próxima etapa de desvirar.)

foreignData.name: Поборница Ронаса
foreignData.text: Вы можете подстегнуть Поборницу Ронаса в момент ее атаки. Когда вы это делаете, она получает +1/+1 до конца хода и не может быть заблокирована существами с силой 2 или меньше в этом ходу. (Подстегнутое существо не разворачивается во время вашего следующего шага разворота.)

foreignData.name: 罗纳斯的大力士
foreignData.text: 你可以于罗纳斯的大力士攻击时耗竭之。当你如此作时，它得+1/+1直到回合结束，且本回合不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。（已耗竭的生物于你的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。）

foreignData.name: 羅納斯的大力士
foreignData.text: 你可以於羅納斯的大力士攻擊時耗竭之。當你如此作時，它得+1/+1直到回合結束，且本回合不能被力量等於或小於2的生物阻擋。（已耗竭的生物於你的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。）

name: Rhonas's Stalwart
originalText: You may exert Rhonas's Stalwart as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

rulings.text: You can’t exert a creature unless an effect allows you to do so. Similar effects that “tap and freeze” a creature (such as that of Decision Paralysis) don’t exert that creature.

If an exerted creature is already untapped during your next untap step (most likely because it had vigilance or an effect untapped it), exert’s effect preventing it from untapping expires without having done anything.
If you gain control of another player’s creature until end of turn and exert it, it will untap during that player’s untap step.

All cards in the Amonkhet set that let you exert a creature let you do so as you declare it as an attacking creature, as do some of the cards in the Hour of Devastation set. You can’t do so later in combat, and creatures put onto the battlefield attacking can’t be exerted. Any abilities that trigger on exerting an attacking creature will resolve before blockers are declared.
Once a creature with power 3 or greater has blocked an exerted Rhonas’s Stalwart, changing the power of the blocking creature won’t cause Rhonas’s Stalwart to become unblocked.

text: You may exert Rhonas's Stalwart as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
